bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with li feng 癘風 , epidemics wind. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry lian ou 蓮藕 quotes Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 : 遍身風癘荷葉三十枚，石灰一斗，淋汁合煮。漬之，半日 乃出。數日一作，良 , “For wind epidemics affecting the entire body: 30 lotus leaves are to be boiled with the 1 dou of strained shi hui liquid. Steep the [body in the liquid] for half a day and then remove it. Do this once every few days. Good [effect]”.
